0.name: Steve Jobs
0.description: Co-founded Apple, driving personal computing and later the iPhone and iPad era

1.name: Steve Wozniak
1.description: Co-founded Apple and engineered the early Apple I and Apple II computers

2.name: Bill Gates
2.description: Co-founded Microsoft, standardizing PC operating systems and productivity software

3.description: Co-founded Microsoft and helped launch the PC software industry
